content.2: Take ye the sum of all the congregation of the children of Israel, after their families, by the house of their fathers, with the number of
content.3: From twenty years old and upward, all that are able to go forth to war in Israel: thou and Aaron shall number them by their armies.
content.4: And with you there shall be a man of every tribe; every one head of the house of his fathers.
content.6: Of Simeon; Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
content.7: Of Judah; Nahshon the son of Amminadab.
content.8: Of Issachar; Nethaneel the son of Zuar.
content.9: Of Zebulun; Eliab the son of Helon.
content.10: Of the children of Joseph: of Ephraim; Elishama the son of Ammihud: of Manasseh; Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
content.11: Of Benjamin; Abidan the son of Gideoni.
content.12: Of Dan; Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai.
content.13: Of Asher; Pagiel the son of Ocran.
content.14: Of Gad; Eliasaph the son of Deuel.
content.15: Of Naphtali; Ahira the son of Enan.
content.17: And Moses and Aaron took these men which are expressed by
content.18: And they assembled all the congregation together on the first
content.20: And the children of Reuben, Israel’s eldest son, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, by their polls, every male from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.21: Those that were numbered of them,
content.22: Of the children of Simeon, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, those that were numbered of them, according to the number of the names, by their polls, every male from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.23: Those that were numbered of them,
content.24: Of the children of Gad, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.25: Those that were numbered of them,
content.26: Of the children of Judah, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.27: Those that were numbered of them,
content.28: Of the children of Issachar, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.29: Those that were numbered of them,
content.30: Of the children of Zebulun, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.31: Those that were numbered of them,

content.35: Those that were numbered of them,
content.36: Of the children of Benjamin, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;

content.38: Of the children of Dan, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;

content.40: Of the children of Asher, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.41: Those that were numbered of them,
content.42: Of the children of Naphtali, throughout their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
content.43: Those that were numbered of them,
content.45: So were all those that were numbered of the children of Israel, by the house of their fathers, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war in Israel;
content.46: Even all they that were numbered were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.
content.47: But the Levites after the tribe of their fathers were not numbered among them.
content.49: Only thou shalt not number the tribe of Levi, neither take the sum of them among the children of Israel:
content.50: But thou shalt appoint the Levites over the tabernacle of testimony, and over all the vessels thereof, and over all things that
content.51: And when the tabernacle setteth forward, the Levites shall take it down: and when the tabernacle is to be pitched, the Levites shall set it up: and the stranger that cometh nigh shall be put to death.
content.52: And the children of Israel shall pitch their tents, every man by his own camp, and every man by his own standard, throughout their hosts.
content.53: But the Levites shall pitch round about the tabernacle of testimony, that there be no wrath upon the congregation of the children of Israel: and the Levites shall keep the charge of the tabernacle of testimony.
